custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND [$STATUS$] AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.companyId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND ([$STRUCTURE_TEMPLATE$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) AND ( (JournalArticle.articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(JournalArticle.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND [$STATUS$] AND (JournalArticle.expirationDate <= ?) AND (tempJournalArticle.version is NULL)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey) WHERE AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL

SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN ResourcePermission ON (ResourcePermission.companyId = JournalArticle.companyId) AND (ResourcePermission.name = 'com.liferay.journal.model.JournalArticle') AND (ResourcePermission.primKey = CAST_TEXT(JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey)) AND (ResourcePermission.scope = ?) WHERE ResourcePermission.primKey IS NULL
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (classNameId = ?) AND (reviewDate >= ?) AND (reviewDate <= ?)
SELECT {JournalArticle.*} FROM JournalArticle WHERE (resourcePrimKey = ?) AND (displayDate <= ?) AND (status = 0) AND (indexable = [$TRUE$]) ORDER BY version DESC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND [$FOLDER_ID$] AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$DDM_STRUCTURE_KEY$]) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] [$STATUS$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT JournalArticle.* FROM JournalArticle LEFT JOIN JournalArticle tempJournalArticle ON [$STATUS_JOIN$] AND (JournalArticle.groupId = tempJournalArticle.groupId) AND (JournalArticle.articleId = tempJournalArticle.articleId) AND (JournalArticle.version < tempJournalArticle.version) WHERE (JournalArticle.companyId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND ([$FOLDER_ID$]) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) AND ([$STRUCTURE_TEMPLATE$]) AND (tempJournalArticle.id_ IS NULL) AND ( (JournalArticle.articleId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.version = ?) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(JournalArticle.title) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.content LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate >= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.displayDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (JournalArticle.reviewDate <= ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY JournalArticle.id_ ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )

SELECT {JournalFeed.*} FROM JournalFeed WHERE (companyId = ?) AND (groupId = ?) AND ( (feedId LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(description) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ORDER BY feedId ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT JournalArticle.articleId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$])) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]

SELECT DISTINCT JournalArticle.folderId AS modelFolderId, JournalArticle.articleId as articleId, JournalArticle.version AS version, 0 AS modelFolder, JournalArticle.displayDate as displayDate, JournalArticle.modifiedDate as modifiedDate FROM ( SELECT JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey AS resourcePrimKey, MAX(JournalArticle.version) AS version FROM JournalArticle WHERE (JournalArticle.groupId = ?) AND (JournalArticle.classNameId = 0) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$])) [$ARTICLE_FOLDER_ID$] GROUP BY JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey, JournalArticle.folderId, JournalArticle.articleId ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN JournalArticle ON (TEMP_TABLE.resourcePrimKey = JournalArticle.resourcePrimKey) AND (TEMP_TABLE.version = JournalArticle.version)
SELECT {JournalFolder.*} FROM JournalFolder LEFT JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = JournalFolder.folderId) WHERE (AssetEntry.classPK IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT folderId AS modelFolderId, '' AS articleId, 0 AS version, 1 AS modelFolder, JournalFolder.createDate as displayDate, JournalFolder.modifiedDate as modifiedDate FROM JournalFolder WHERE (JournalFolder.groupId = ?) AND ([$STATUS$]) [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$]
